title: A breife narration of the possession, dispossession, and, repossession of William Sommers and of some proceedings against Mr Iohn Dorrell preacher, with aunsweres to such obiections as are made to prove the pretended counterfeiting of the said Sommers. Together with certaine depositions taken at Nottingham concerning the said matter.
author: G. Co.
notes: Defence of Darrel, edited by G. Co.
Place of publication conjectured by STC.
The title page ornament is identical to that in STC 5331, which has Amsterdam imprint.
Identified as STC 22917 on UMI microfilm, reel 1035.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 213 (Bodleian copy) and at reel 1035 (British Library copy).
